Question: This person hosted Academy Awards solo in 2001 and 2003, and with Alec Baldwin in 2010.
Hints: After high school graduation, this person attended Santa Ana Junior College, taking classes in drama and English poetry.
Inspired by his philosophy classes, this person considered becoming a professor instead of an actor-comedian.
In 1993, this person wrote his first full length play Picasso at the Lapin Agile.
